Chuck Schumer , the state's senior senator, wins approval from 59 percent of New Yorkers, up from 55 percent. His current rating is close to his all-time high of 61 percent in October 2004.

During his time working for me, Andy Coulson has carried out his role with complete professionalism. He has been a brilliant member of my team and has thrown himself at the job with skill and dedication. He can be extremely proud of the role he has played, including for the last eight months in Government. "I wish Andy Coulson all the very best for his future, which I am certain will be a successful one.
